description: This is an HTML file that serves as the frontend interface for a database visualizer application. It includes HTML structure, CSS styles, and JavaScript code for fetching and displaying database information, tables, and data interactively.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets the view.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML to display a data table.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content based on its data type and length.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for longer or object data.
